name: Red union 1
description:
This series of works I dedicate to color. Red is a sense of strength and greatness. All the pictures show women in the best versions of themselves. The woman, like the red color for me, conveys sexuality, beauty and power. And the crimson color goes hand in hand with the woman. Every job has its meaning, but I suggest you find something in common in each peace.

Working at number one, despite the bright red of the picture, conveys femininity. Lace, light curls and flirty phone conversation — all creates an atmosphere of sweet and unobtrusive sexuality. But is this sweet girl so simple? Look at her gaze...
